tasks.label: Build Amazon (MSVC + SFML)
tasks.command: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat" && cl /std:c++17 /EHsc amazon_gui.cpp /I D:\lib\SFML-2.5.1\include /link /LIBPATH:D:\lib\SFML-2.5.1\lib sfml-graphics.lib sfml-window.lib sfml-system.lib
